remarks: An unbounded operator determines an unbounded sequence.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmoubi.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nmoubi.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
nmoubi.l $e |- L = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nmoubi.m $e |- M = ( normCV ` W ) $.
nmoubi.3 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
nmoubi.u $e |- U e. NrmCVec $.
nmoubi.w $e |- W e. NrmCVec $.
nmounbseqi $p |- ( ( T : X --> Y /\ ( N ` T ) = +oo ) -> E. f ( f : NN --> X /\ A. k e. NN ( ( L ` ( f ` k ) ) <_ 1 /\ k < ( M ` ( T ` ( f ` k ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d L f k $.
$d M f k $.
$d N k $.
$d T f k $.
$d X f k $.
$d Y k $.
